unifiedTrading.comment: Master control - dryRun keeps trading safe while using live price data

buying.comment: BTC buying configuration with randomization - amounts vary between min/max, limited daily trades

selling.comment: BTC selling configuration - autoWithdrawToBank: auto-withdraw to bank, minWithdrawalAmount: minimum amount for withdrawal, withdrawalDelay: minutes to wait before withdrawal, keepMinimumGbpBalance: minimum GBP to keep in Coinbase

emergencyOverride.comment: Override trading hours for emergency sells when price jumps >15%

timing.comment: Human-like timing patterns - random delays: 5-30 min, trading hours: 8 AM-6 PM, weekends off

randomPolling.comment: Random polling: 15-45 minutes apart, minimum 10min gap

monitoring.comment: Base monitoring interval with configurable randomization

safety.comment: Safety limits - cooldown in milliseconds (300000 = 5 minutes)

profitTracking.comment: Profit tracking - milestoneMode: 'progressive' (uses milestones array), 'fixed' (uses fixedMilestoneIncrement), or 'static' (uses staticMilestoneAmount)

api.comment: Using live Coinbase Pro API for real price data (but trades are still simulated in dry run)

examples.buyScenario: When BTC drops to £80,000 or falls 3% from recent high, buy £50 worth
examples.sellScenario: When BTC rises to £90,000 or gains 5% from recent low, sell 0.01 BTC
examples.profitScenario: When total profit reaches £10, alert and consider selling
examples.safetyScenario: Maximum 10 trades per day with 5-minute cooldown between trades
